articles.title: NASA astronaut reaches Earth after spending record 355 days in space - Free Press Journal
articles.description: Mark Vande Hei, who spent 355 days in low-Earth orbit- the longest continuous stay in space by an American - has safely returned to Earth along with two cosmonauts aboard a Russian spacecraft.

articles.title: First Nations delegates ask Pope Francis to revoke church doctrine used to justify colonialism - CBC News
articles.description: Members of the Assembly of First Nations (AFN) urged Pope Francis on Thursday to revoke centuries-old papal decrees used to justify the seizure of Indigenous land in the Americas by colonial powers.

articles.title: Eating Two Servings of Avocado Each Week Could Decrease Your Risk of Having a Heart Attack - Martha Stewart
articles.description: According to a new study published in the Journal of the American Heart Association, consuming just one avocado weekly may be a simple and effective preventative care strategy.
